text.section:
At reasonable times an inspection may be conducted of a plant, place of business, or job site of:
a bidder or offeror seeking a procurement contract;
any contractor under a procurement contract;
a subcontractor under a procurement contract; or
a prospective subcontractor of:
a bidder or offeror seeking a procurement contract; or
a contractor under a procurement contract.

An inspection under this section may be conducted by:
the Department of Legislative Services;
the unit engaged in procurement; or
as authorized by law, any other unit.
